summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney to an unknown recipient forwarding a potential lead regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The lead originates from a private security contact of a NYPD Lieutenant's former colleague, who claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject alongside Jeffrey Epstein about whom a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject alongside Ghislaine Maxwell about whom a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

connections.description: Both are named together as subjects about whom a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

events.title: Lead forwarded to FBI
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards a potential lead regarding Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI, based on information from a private security contact.

keyFacts: A private security contact, working for an unnamed individual with homes in New York, Florida, and the Bahamas, claims to have information and documents regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The lead was communicated by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York to an unknown recipient, who states they will pass it on to the FBI.
The source of the lead is a former colleague of a NYPD Lieutenant's brother, indicating a law enforcement-adjacent connection.
The email is dated April 14, 2021, which is after Epstein's death and during Maxwell's prosecution.
